title: no sub-repo for exp/types after migration to go-1
body:
hi,

after migrating to go-1, the exp/foo packages have been removed from the go-1 packages
and, according to [1], have been moved to subrepositories.

but this hasn't been done for exp/types. (AFAICT)
and it isn't listed in the deleted packages [2].

could this be fixed ?

-s


[1] http://weekly.golang.org/doc/go1.html#subrepo
[2] http://weekly.golang.org/doc/go1.html#deleted
